name: Notice Me Leena-senpai!
description:
For over a century, the world has been at peace. Demonkind and Humankind have co-existed in peace. Suddenly, the Demon Lord declared war and began a full assault on humanity. All anyone could do was fight to survive. The question still remains: Why did the Demon Lord attack?

Notice Me Leena-senpai! focuses on the lives of Leena and her friends studying at the All-Girls School of Magic, where one of the Demon Lords minions has begun to attack. Why is the magic school a target? Will Leena and her friends be able to defend the school, her city, and her beloved food?

Gameplay
Notice Me Leena is a grid based tower defense game with visual novel elements. Fight your way through countless waves of enemies with over 20 types of towers to push back the forces of the Demon Lord! Maybe you'll find out why he's attacking along the way. Unlock new tower types to aid you in battles! Be careful however, as the Demon Lord has many minions, and he just might have noticed you.

Demo Information
The updated demo version of Notice Me Leena-senpai features the first two worlds of the game and an additional secret map, which unlocks by beating the first world. This secret map contains towers, enemies, and other mechanics that won't be seen until much later in the base game, such as the ability to use items and specials.

Additionally, we have included the Jam Version of Notice Me Leena-senpai for anyone who wishes to play it as well. The Jam version of Leena however, retains its original keyboard controls, so please be aware of this.
